name: Youth Speaks
description: Through the intersection of arts education and youth development practices, civic and cultural participation, and artistic presentation, Youth Speaks creates safe spaces that challenge young people to find, develop, publicly present, and apply their voices as creators of societal change. Youth Speaks exists to shift the perception of young people by combating illiteracy, alienation, isolation, and silence, creating a global movement of brave new voices bringing the noise from the margins to the
fullDescription: Through the intersection of arts education and youth development practices, civic and cultural participation, and artistic presentation, Youth Speaks creates safe spaces that challenge young people to find, develop, publicly present, and apply their voices as creators of societal change. Youth Speaks exists to shift the perception of young people by combating illiteracy, alienation, isolation, and silence, creating a global movement of brave new voices bringing the noise from the margins to the
whatTheyOffer: Youth Speaks offers a comprehensive slate of literary arts education and creative youth development programs while also providing numerous opportunities for youth to be published and heard. Youth Speaks is a leading presenter of Spoken Word performance, education, and youth development programs. In-Person and Online programs are available Writing and Performance Workshops Events - Open Mic, Teen Poetry Slam, and Youth led Summer programming.
